ctx: intros Phi x y z Hxy Hyz.
exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language GammaD : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L GammaD minL : MinimumLanguage L minSC : MinimumSequentCalculus L GammaD Phi : context x, y, z : expr Hxy : Phi |-- x --> y Hyz : Phi |-- y --> z The term "x" has type "expr" while it is expected to have type "Phi |-- y".

original: intros Phi x y z Hxy Hyz. apply (deduction_modus_ponens Phi y z x). - apply (deduction_impp_elim Phi x y). auto. - auto.
